title: Dr. Ajay Kumar Koli, PhD
text:
Hi! I’m Ajay Kumar, co-founder and Executive Director at SARA, where we teach data science to under-represented communities in India. I’m passionate to make learning data science engaging and effective (possibly fun). I currently live in Sonipat, HR with my daughter, mom and wife.
Away from work, I love jogging and cooking.



Education

Ph.D. in Marketing, 2019University of Hyderabad, India
DAAD Fellowship 2014University of Würzburg, Germany
M.B.A in Tourism Studies, 2008Pondicherry Central University, India Gold Medalist
B.A. Hons. in Russian Language, 2006Jawaharlal Nehru University, India
B.A. in Tourism Studies, 2006IGNOU, India




Interests

Education empowerment & social impact
Data science & R programming
Community development
